name: dfareporting_floodlightActivities_get
description: Gets one floodlight activity by ID.

profileId.description: User profile ID associated with this request.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Contains properties of a Floodlight activity.

$ul: **accountId**: Account ID of this floodlight activity. This is a read-only field that can be left blank.

**advertiserId**: Advertiser ID of this floodlight activity. If this field is left blank, the value will be copied over either from the activity group's advertiser or the existing activity's advertiser.
**advertiserIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**cacheBustingType**: Code type used for cache busting in the generated tag. Applicable only when floodlightActivityGroupType is COUNTER and countingMethod is STANDARD_COUNTING or UNIQUE_COUNTING.
**countingMethod**: Counting method for conversions for this floodlight activity. This is a required field.
**defaultTags**: Dynamic floodlight tags.
**expectedUrl**: URL where this tag will be deployed. If specified, must be less than 256 characters long.
**floodlightActivityGroupId**: Floodlight activity group ID of this floodlight activity. This is a required field.
**floodlightActivityGroupName**: Name of the associated floodlight activity group. This is a read-only field.
**floodlightActivityGroupTagString**: Tag string of the associated floodlight activity group. This is a read-only field.
**floodlightActivityGroupType**: Type of the associated floodlight activity group. This is a read-only field.

**floodlightConfigurationId**: Floodlight configuration ID of this floodlight activity. If this field is left blank, the value will be copied over either from the activity group's floodlight configuration or from the existing activity's floodlight configuration.
**floodlightConfigurationIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**floodlightTagType**: The type of Floodlight tag this activity will generate. This is a required field.
**hidden**: Whether this activity is archived.
**id**: ID of this floodlight activity. This is a read-only, auto-generated field.
**idDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#floodlightActivity".
**name**: Name of this floodlight activity. This is a required field. Must be less than 129 characters long and cannot contain quotes.
**notes**: General notes or implementation instructions for the tag.
**publisherTags**: Publisher dynamic floodlight tags.
**secure**: Whether this tag should use SSL.
**sslCompliant**: Whether the floodlight activity is SSL-compliant. This is a read-only field, its value detected by the system from the floodlight tags.
**sslRequired**: Whether this floodlight activity must be SSL-compliant.
**subaccountId**: Subaccount ID of this floodlight activity. This is a read-only field that can be left blank.
**tagFormat**: Tag format type for the floodlight activity. If left blank, the tag format will default to HTML.

**tagString**: Value of the cat= parameter in the floodlight tag, which the ad servers use to identify the activity. This is optional: if empty, a new tag string will be generated for you. This string must be 1 to 8 characters long, with valid characters being a-z0-9[ _ ]. This tag string must also be unique among activities of the same activity group. This field is read-only after insertion.

**userDefinedVariableTypes**: List of the user-defined variables used by this conversion tag. These map to the "u[1-100]=" in the tags. Each of these can have a user defined type. Acceptable values are U1 to U100, inclusive.
